title: Be more lenient Queue Penalties
body: Has anyone ever gotten the message saying that your graphics card is not updated or league cant read it (Something stupid), or when it says that you have no internet connection but you obviously do. This is consistent problem it really makes me fucking angry. Not 10 minutes ago i was 1-1 in promos after getting flamed by everyone in the game for no reason and when i go to play my 3rd game for G1 it says im offline and have no internet connection. ALWAYS i have to restarted my computer or stop the shutting down mid way where it closes everything. I feel like Riot should be able to have a thing where if its either one of those two errors someone shouldn't be able to lose. I have probably lost more lp cause of not connecting then actually playing (Obviously exaggerating) but still. I should be in Plat with the amount of losses ive gotten from those and im serious about that

replies.body: It sounds like you have a combination of different issues here that may be impeding your game.  As a first step, I suggest using our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) to make sure your settings and hardware are configured to run properly with League.  Your next step should be to use our  [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to make sure that you can maintain a steady connection while you're in game, otherwise your network may crap out and cause you to obtain penalties like [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ).  Let me know if you have any issues after going through these steps.
I will try but the thing is it happens occasionally like i would restart computer and i would be fine.
It is just frustrating that ive waited bc of these stupid leaverbusters more time than i have played like i cant wait another 20 minutes anymore just so i can lose because my teammates flame and feed
